extendedInfo.description: This app brings to you all the fixtures and results for ABSA Currie Cup session 2012. It brings to you the simplest and most user-friendly application to get all details about the game at a glance. With this app, you can stay up-to-date as your team battles towards victory. It is a must have if you have missed the game and need to know the score.About Currie CupThe Currie Cup tournament (also known as the ABSA Currie Cup for sponsorship reasons) is South Africa's premier domestic rugby union competition, played each winter and spring (August to October), featuring teams representing either entire provinces or substantial regions within provinces. Although it is the premier domestic competition, South African teams also compete in the international Super Rugby competition.Steeped in history and tradition, the ABSA Currie Cup dates back to 1889 and is the oldest provincial rugby competition in the world. The tournament is regarded as the cornerstone of South Africa's rugby heritage, and the coveted gold trophy remains the most prestigious prize in South African domestic rugbyThe 2012 Currie Cup Premier Division will be the 73rd season in the competition since it started in 1889 and will be contested from 11 August to 27 October 2012. The tournament (known as the ABSA Currie Cup Premier Division for sponsorship reasons) is the top tier of South Africa's premier domestic rugby union competition.Features:- Fixtures: Have all fixtures at your finger tips, date and time get converted to your devices time zone- Results: Score are NOT live, they are delay- News Feeds: Keep up to date with the latest news events in the rugby world, you get RSS feeds from newspapers- My Team: Select you favorite team and view all there matches in one glance.All information is for 2012 session only.All the above information is very well organized so that you can easily navigate to find the information you need.Live scores come-up as they happen, this mean you need to be connected to the internet all the time with the app running.If you have any requests, concerns or support issues, please e-mail us on support@codebug.co.nz. We will ensure that your e-mail is responded to in 2 working days and your issue addressed within 7 working days. We would appreciate if you could write to us about your concerns and have it addressed rather than write a bad review. Writing about your concerns helps us help you enjoy your app better. If we don't know about the bug, we can't it.

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Looks good but keeps force closing. Please update, and I\'ll give 5 stars. SGS2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & user friendly
reviews.comment: This app has all that one need to follow the Currie cup tournament packaged in a user friendly way. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Great little app. A few minor bugs with fixture times and updates, but its pretty much all you need to follow the Currie Cup. Great work.
